snippet: Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls became the first player in Major League Soccer history to capture three straight player of the week awards.
abstract: New York Red Bulls striker Thierry Henry becomes the first player in Major League Soccer history to capture three straight player of the week awards.
lead_paragraph: Thierry Henry of the Red Bulls became the first player in Major League Soccer history to capture three straight player of the week awards.

headline.main: Henry Is Player of the Week Again
headline.print_headline: Henry Is M.L.S. Player of the Week Again
